posts.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Magic Set Preview Schedule: When and Where to Watch
posts.excerpt: Wizards of the Coast announces live preview coverage for the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Magic set on February 17, 2026. Get the schedule, expected mechanics, and competitive implications for Pioneer and other formats.

posts.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Magic Bundles Delayed: What North American Players Need to Know
posts.excerpt: Wizards of the Coast has announced a delay for Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Magic bundle products in North America due to a logistical issue. Here's what preorder customers need to know.

posts.title: Garruk Returns? MagicCon Amsterdam Art Teases Planeswalker's Comeback After 7-Year Hiatus
posts.excerpt: MagicCon Amsterdam 2026 promotional art features Garruk, suggesting the iconic hunter-planeswalker's return after a 7-year absence from new cards.

posts.title: Izzet Prowess Dominates MTGO Pioneer League: Deck Tech and Sideboarding Guide
posts.excerpt: Izzet Prowess proves it's a tier-one Pioneer archetype with MTGO League victory. Full decklist breakdown, sideboarding strategies, and matchup analysis included.
